title: Strengthening Competencies in Collaborative Higher Mathematics Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics pedagogy and curriculum understanding, experience with digital education tools
context.additional_context: Blended learning environments conducted via teacher collaboration platforms and integrated online-offline spaces.

learning_goals: Teachers can propose three or more lesson design plans utilizing diverse educational resources (textbooks, digital content, self-produced materials)
Compare and analyze two or more pedagogical approaches to mathematical concepts through collaborative discussion
Provide and receive real-time lesson design feedback with peer teachers using digital tools (collaboration platforms, online whiteboards)

resources: Digital Collaboration Tools (Google Workspace, Padlet, etc.)
Online Content Library for Mathematics Education

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
